body: Uncommon Sense and Antunez blog about two different calls to demonstrate in Cuba - one "to demand the freedom and democracy that have been taken from us" and the other to mark the "one year anniversary of the assassination of political prisoner Orlando Zapata."
original_body: Uncommon Sense and Antunez blog about two different calls to demonstrate in Cuba - one "to demand the freedom and democracy that have been taken from us" and the other to mark the "one year anniversary of the assassination of political prisoner Orlando Zapata."
title: Cuba: Calls to Demonstrate

sentence: Uncommon Sense and Antunez blog about two different calls to demonstrate in Cuba - one "to demand the freedom and democracy that have been taken from us" and the other to mark the "one year anniversary of the assassination of political prisoner Orlando Zapata."
